title: Perma Banned But Not My Fault
body: Hello So Here is what happen and why Riot should remove my perma Ban, So around 2 or 3 months ago I was Suspended for 14 days due to me begin toxic , so i understood that it was my fault and I i was fine with it, However I forgot about LOL after those 14 days due to me not playing and Having school, Today 11/20/17  I had free time and Decide to play LOL , Once i looged in I got a message saying i was perma banned, I was shocked since i haven't played since the 14 day suspension. How ever I look at na.op.gg and saw my match history and it showed games that i played , I know no one that knows my password besides me , which means someone probably hijacked my account and got my account banned due to them begin toxic, I really hope the admins can hear me out , and Unban me from LOL , I will make sure this never happens agian , and I also spent so much money on this account PLEASE urban me , Thank You

replies.body: Yikes that would suck to come back from a temp suspension only to see you're perma-banned. It looks like this ban wasn't placed until *today*, and you were able to play a few games before it happened, so it might have only been placed due to something from one of today's games. If you aren't able to see a reform card for this, you're always welcome to reach out to our player behavior team for the full context of what happened in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
The thing is 11/21/17 was the first day I open LOL client since the 14 day Temp suspension , and right when i logged in I got the message , haven't played since then
That really sucks my guy, Hope you find help  Best of Luck
